Gold.en: Lets the user get in the first hit.

Silver.en: Lets the user get in the first hit.

Crystal.en: Lets the user get in the first hit.

Ruby.en: An extremely fast attack that always strikes first.

Sapphire.en: An extremely fast attack that always strikes first.

Emerald.en: An extremely fast attack that always strikes first.

FireRed.en: An almost invisibly fast attack that is certain to strike first.

LeafGreen.en: An almost invisibly fast attack that is certain to strike first.

Diamond.en: The user lunges at the foe at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

Pearl.en: The user lunges at the foe at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

Platinum.en: The user lunges at the foe at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

HeartGold.en: The user lunges at the foe at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

SoulSilver.en: The user lunges at the foe at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

Black.en: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

White.en: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

Black_2.en: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

White_2.en: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

X.en: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. This move always goes first.

Y.en: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. This move always goes first.

Sun.de: Sehr schneller Angriff mit hoher Erstschlagquote.
